comments.creator: philipp@bugzilla.kewis.ch
comments.raw_text:
Especially for servers that process the invitations server side, it makes sense to refresh remote calendars before showing an itip invitation. Otherwise you might be tempted to update an event that has already been updated server-side.

See bug 670916 for some more details.
